author: fern
description:
The most affordable, fast and easy-to-use blender render farm on the planet - get $10 off instantly when you use code “FERN” at https://fern.deals/superluminal (ad)

A reconstruction of the attack on right-wing activist Charlie Kirk. The events are still unfolding.

Check out Hoog's mapping of the assassination here: https://youtu.be/OboCDDMAxxQ?si=MnZ9yODgAw0ZB8_J

Sources:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1a24BQ9yvLyHxTPnAbcC-JvxBPOg7GYJ6pR9FKyyJJP4/edit?usp=sharing

00:42 This should say "Mapping of the shooting".

title: The Hunt for the Charlie Kirk Shooter
